meanings.sent1: The bratty child threw a tantrum in the store.
meanings.sent2: She always acts bratty when she doesn't get her way.
meanings.sent3: The bratty puppy chewed up all the shoes in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her bratty behavior was like nails on a chalkboard to her parents.
meanings.sent5: The bratty student disrupted the entire class with his constant interruptions.

meanings.definition: Behaving in an immature or childish manner.
meanings.sent1: He made a bratty comment during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The bratty siblings argued over who got to sit in the front seat.
meanings.sent3: The bratty kitten knocked over the vase and then ran away.
meanings.sent4: Her bratty attitude was like a dark cloud hanging over the party.
meanings.sent5: The bratty team refused to follow the coach's instructions during the game.
